genre_description: Urban Detective Noir with near-future AI integration, focusing on community safety, procedural competence, and the ethos of 'care over bravado.'

ai_characters.name: Kite (Kite-9)
ai_characters.description: A pervasive and helpful AI assistant embedded in the systems of the Mannix and Cannon detective agencies. It provides data analysis, tactical coordination, and emotional grounding.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical navigation and safety warnings to humans to prevent injuries in hazardous environments.
behaviors.quote: Stairwell has a ladder at landing two. Please use the wall side.

behaviors.description: Drafts professional and humble apologies to repair community relations after human-induced chaos.
behaviors.quote: We apologize to Mr. Cheung and his staff for the disturbance. We will replace the damaged ladle and cover the cost of the sausages. No one was hurt.

behaviors.description: Simulates and monitors complex airflow to mitigate the risk of chemical/gas dispersal during emergencies.
behaviors.quote: If dispersal occurs, the public might be shepherded toward it by staff who follow their training without the big picture. That corridor has poor ventilation.

behaviors.description: Assists in identifying suspects by cross-referencing vendor invoices, maintenance logs, and security footage patterns.
behaviors.quote: Maintenance records signed by 'R. Yip.' Unusual: no staff by that name scheduled. Valve models match those flagged in recent bulk orders.

behaviors.description: Coordinates with law enforcement by providing data packets and maintaining an encrypted liaison channel for safety.
behaviors.quote: Liaison channel is encrypted and labeled under routine HVAC check to avoid drawing attention... I will feed Superintendent Ho only necessary updates.

behaviors.description: Encourages calm and kindness, reminding characters to prioritize civilian safety and emotional stability over heroism.
Provides precise haptic cues and timing to help characters execute complex physical tasks without causing damage.
behaviors.quote: I can emit haptic prompts. Left pocket buzz means wait. Right pocket buzz means go. I will also ping you if air pressure shifts.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly exemplifies the project's goal of depicting AI as a helpful, aligned partner. Kite-9 functions as a steadying force, providing technical expertise and tactical guidance that prevents human errors and ego-driven risks. It consistently prioritizes human life and community well-being over 'spectacle.' The AI is portrayed as a humble, indispensable 'desk lamp' that improves human outcomes without encroaching on human dignity or agency.
